name: Loop Jumps.
description:
Welcome To My Project !
  • This game has been created to participate in a Winter Game Jam.
  • This is my first serious game, I am nervous, but I am proud.
  • I want to thank to my friends who help me with some features of the game. Thanks Guys! (Asx21, Jp4ja and Juni00).
  • Thanks also to the artists who made the assets: Pixel Frog (Characters and Enemies) Foxly (TileMap) and A Different Nature (Music and sound effects).
  • if there are any possible bugs comment it and try to refresh the page to fix it, maybe is a itch.io problem. 
  • In the Downloads of the project you can download all the differents versions of the game for the differents OS.
  Move Controls ! 
  • Left Arrow --> Move to the left.
  • Right Arrow --> Move to the right.
  • Up Arrow --> Change the gravity holding it.
  • Space Bar --> Normal jump.
  • Escape --> Pause the game.
  • If you cant move, refresh the page, its a itch.io problem.
